 It is the diversity of this country that makes it strong. Many people from different views, religions, sexual orientations, nationalities, economic levels, and educational backgrounds. No one should be asking anyone to leave. We all have the right to be here in America, the melting pot. The Statue of Liberty invites all the tired meek and weary to be here and be Americans.  They seem to want to anyway! Anyway, you missed my MAIN point, and that is that the Lefties only want to be here when it goes THEIR way...don't you think that childish? Do you really think that's Patriotic? When your country needs you most, you run because it doesn't go YOUR way? Maybe in the PC world Patriotism fits into your neat, convenient definition, but not in reality. Oh, and don't give me this "diversity makes us stronger BS"! What REALLY makes us strong is people from other countries coming here who want to be AMERICAN, no hyphenations...THAT is what made us strong in the early 1900's, immigrants who made their kids speak English and didn't demand another language in the school, among many other things

I have faith in all the people in charge and while I might disagree with a few things I find it really hard to believe that things will change so much to make my life hell.
